dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S360 IS: To authorize an additional district judgeship for the district of Idaho.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Crapo (for himself and Mr. Risch) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To authorize an additional district judgeship for the district of Idaho.

section.header: District judgeship for the district of Idaho

subsection.text: The President shall appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, 1 additional district judge for the district of Idaho.
The table in section 133(a) of title 28, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to Idaho and inserting the following:
